description: Erection of a rear roof extension involving an increase in the ridge height by 300mm including, installation of solar pv panels and a rooflight on top, installation of windows, doors and a Juliette balcony to the rear; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side of the existing back addition; alterations to the external front facade of the main building to include, repointing bricks, replacement gutters and downpipes, installation of solar pv panels and installation of a rooflight in the front roofslope, replacement of existing single glazed sash and casement windows with new triple glazed sash and casement windows, erection of a new low level brick built front boundary wall with metal railings on top to replace existing front boundary wall; alterations to the second floor back addition to include, raising the roof height and installation of a triple glazed window on top; alterations to the external rear facade of the main building to include, repointing bricks, replacement of existing single glazed windows with new triple glazed windows, installation of steel cladding to parts of the external wall, installation of new triple glazed sliding doors following the removal of existing windows to the rear of ground floor back addition; excavation under the footprint of the main building and part of the rear garden to form a lightwell, including lowering part of the rear basement floor level, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
